transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You see me on the road
👪 I can carry your family
⛽ I need gas to go

transport.question: I float on water and can take you to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and made of metal
🚢 Pirates might travel on me
⚓ I have an anchor

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take you to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings
✈️ Pilots fly me
💺 You sit down when you ride me

transport.question: I go on tracks and have lots of carriages. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal rails
🚂 I say 'choo choo!'
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Lots of people can ride me at once

transport.question: I am like a car but I only have two wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🦺 You need to wear a helmet
🏍️ I go very fast!
🚦I have a headlight

transport.question: I am a house on wheels and people can live in me while traveling. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ I am good for camping.
🔑 I have a door and windows.
🛏️ I have beds inside of me.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I'm used for rescues.
🚨 You can see me flying over the hospital.
🏥 I can land on the top of buildings.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you have to pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍⚕️ I do not need fuel.
🔔 I have a bell to warn people you are coming.
💪 You use your legs to move me.

transport.question: I'm a long vehicle that carries lots of people around a city, stopping frequently for people to hop on and off. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌I am bigger than a car
🛑 I have a stop button
🗺️ I follow a route

transport.question: I go very high up into space and explore planets. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🚀 I am fast!
🪐 I leave Earth

bug.question: I have six legs and I love to crawl. I make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I live in a hive.
🌻 I like to fly around flowers.
🐝 I make something sweet that you can eat.

bug.question: I am green and jump really high. I like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am not a frog, but I also jump.
🌿 I live in grassy places.
🎵 Sometimes you hear me chirping in the grass.

bug.question: I have pretty wings and fly around flowers. People like my colors, what am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
🌈 My wings can be many different colors.
🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 I live in a colony with many others.
🪨 Sometimes you see me carrying crumbs on the ground.

bug.question: I light up at night and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a light on my body.
🌃 You can see me in the summer evenings.
✨ My light helps me find other bugs like me.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of thin threads.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🦟 I eat insects that get stuck in my trap.

bug.question: I am a beetle that is red with black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a symbol of good luck in some places.
🐞 I help farmers by eating other bugs that eat their plants.
⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I can be many different colors. Before I become a butterfly, what am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves to grow.
🌿 I change a lot during my life.
➡️ One day I'll fly

bug.question: I sing very loudly in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I live in trees.
🔊 Only the males sing.
🎶 My sound helps me find a mate.

bug.question: I can walk on water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have long legs that spread my weight.
🌊 You might see me on a pond or lake.
🦟 I eat other small insects that fall into the water.
